TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AttributeCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type AttributeCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示特性的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是只读的;它不实现添加或移除属性的方法。The class is read-only; it does not implement methods to add or remove attributes. 必须从此类继承以实现这些方法。You must inherit from this class to implement these methods. 使用 属性可查找集合中存在的属性数。Use the property to find the number of attributes that exist in the collection. 你还可以使用此类的方法来查询集合中有关其内容的信息。You can also use the methods of this class to query the collection about its contents. 调用 方法，验证集合中是否存在指定的特性或特性数组。Call the method to verify that a specified attribute or attribute array exists in the collection. 调用 方法，验证集合中是否存在指定的特性或特性数组，以及指定特性的值是否与集合中的值相同。Call the method to verify that a specified attribute or array of attributes exists in the collection, and that the values of the specified attributes are the same as the values in the collection. 虽然大多数属性都具有默认值，但不需要默认值。While most attributes have default values, default values are not required. 如果特性没有默认值，则从采用类型的索引属性返回 `null`。If an attribute has no default value, `null` is returned from the indexed property that takes a type. 定义自己的属性时，可以通过提供不带参数的构造函数，或者定义名为 "Default" 的属性类型的公共静态字段，来声明默认值。When defining your own attributes, you can declare a default value by either providing a constructor that takes no arguments, or defining a public static field of your attribute type named "Default". ## Examples 第一个代码示例检查是否已在此集合中设置 。The first code example checks to see whether the has been set in this collection. 第二个代码示例获取按钮的 的实际值。The second code example gets the actual value of the for a button. 两个示例都要求在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。Both examples require that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. 使用属性时，请验证是否已设置了属性，或者是否访问了属性的值。When using attributes, verify that an attribute has been set, or access its value. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

The attribute collection.

span.span: Determines whether this collection of attributes has the specified attribute or array of attributes.

Public Function Contains (attribute As Attribute) As Boolean

span.span: An to find in the collection.

summary.span: 确定该特性集合是否具有指定的特性。

span.span: Determines whether this collection of attributes has the specified attribute.

returns.span: 如果集合包含该特性或是该类型特性的默认特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection contains the attribute or is the default attribute for the type of attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中存在指定类型的属性，并且指定属性的值与集合中属性实例的值相同，则此集合具有指定的属性。This collection has the specified attribute if the specified type of attribute exists in the collection, and if the value of the specified attribute is the same as the value of the instance of the attribute in the collection. 和 方法之间的区别在于 对属性调用 方法， 调用 方法。The difference between the and methods is that calls the method on an attribute, and calls the method. 对于大多数属性，这些方法执行相同的操作。For most attributes, these methods do the same thing. 但对于可能有多个标志的属性，通常会实现 以便在满足任何标志时返回 `true`。For attributes that may have multiple flags, however, is typically implemented so that it returns `true` if any of the flags are satisfied. 例如，请考虑一个数据绑定属性，其中包含布尔型标志 "SupportsSql"、"SupportsOleDb" 和 "SupportsXml"。For example, consider a data binding attribute with the Boolean flags "SupportsSql", "SupportsOleDb", and "SupportsXml". 此属性可能存在于支持所有三种数据绑定方法的属性上。This attribute may be present on a property that supports all three data-binding approaches. 通常情况下，程序员只需要知道某个特定的方法可用，而不是全部三个。It will often be the case that a programmer needs to know only if a particular approach is available, not all three. 因此，程序员可以将 与包含编程人员需要的标志的属性实例一起使用。Therefore, a programmer could use with an instance of the attribute containing only the flags the programmer needs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查集合中是否有 设置为 `true`。The following code example checks to see whether the collection has a set to `true`. 它假定已在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果该集合包含所有特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection contains all the attributes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中存在所有指定的属性类型，并且指定数组中的每个属性与集合中的属性相同，则此集合包含指定的属性数组。This collection has the specified array of attributes if all the specified attribute types exist in the collection and if each attribute in the specified array is the same as an attribute in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例对 `button1` 和 `textBox1` 中的属性进行比较，以查看该按钮的特性是否包含在文本框的特性中。The following code example compares the attributes in `button1` and `textBox1` to see whether the attributes for the button are contained in the attributes for the text box. 假设已在窗体上创建了 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes that both `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Contains1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性设置循环访问对象集合的循环的限制。You can use the property to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects. 如果集合从零开始，请确保将 `Count - 1` 用作循环的上限。If the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性在文本框中打印 `button1` 的属性数。The following code example uses the property to print the number of properties on `button1` in a text box. 它假定已在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。The index number is zero-based. 因此，必须从特定 的数字位置减去1才能访问该 。Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular to access that . 例如，若要获取第三个 ，需要指定 `myColl[2]`。For example, to get the third , you need to specify `myColl[2]`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性在文本框中打印索引号所指定的 的名称。The following code example uses the property to print the name of the specified by the index number in a text box. 由于索引号从零开始，因此，此代码示例将在文本框中打印第二个 的名称。Because the index number is zero-based, this code example prints the name of the second in a text box. 它假定已在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.this Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中不存在该属性，则此属性将返回该属性类型的默认值。If the attribute does not exist in the collection, this property returns the default value for the attribute type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从集合中获取 ，并打印其值。The following code example gets the from the collection and prints its value. 它假定已在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. 若要运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](/dotnet/standard/assembly/names)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](/dotnet/standard/assembly/names). remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性可以为匹配提供支持。An attribute can provide support for matching. 和 方法之间的区别在于 对属性调用 方法， 调用 方法。The difference between the and methods is that calls the method on an attribute, and calls the method. 对于大多数属性，这些方法执行相同的操作。For most attributes, these methods do the same thing. 但对于可能有多个标志的属性，通常会实现 以便在满足任何标志时返回 `true`。For attributes that may have multiple flags, however, is typically implemented so that it returns `true` if any of the flags are satisfied. 例如，请考虑一个数据绑定属性，其中包含布尔型标志 "SupportsSql"、"SupportsOleDb" 和 "SupportsXml"。For example, consider a data binding attribute with the Boolean flags "SupportsSql", "SupportsOleDb", and "SupportsXml". 此属性可能存在于支持所有三个数据绑定方法的属性上。This attribute may be present on a property that supports all three data binding approaches. 通常情况下，程序员只需要知道某个特定的方法可用，而不是全部三个。It will often be the case that a programmer needs to know only if a particular approach is available, not all three. 因此，程序员可以将 与包含编程人员需要的标志的属性实例一起使用。Therefore, a programmer could use with an instance of the attribute containing only the flags the programmer needs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例验证 是否是集合的成员，并且是否已将其设置为 `true`。The following code example verifies that the is a member of the collection and that it has been set to `true`. 它假定已在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic AttributeCollection.Matches Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性可以为匹配提供支持。An attribute can provide support for matching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例对按钮和文本框中的属性进行比较，以确定它们是否匹配。The following code example compares the attributes in a button and a text box to see whether they match. 它假定已在窗体上创建 `button1` 和 `textBox1`。It assumes that `button1` and `textBox1` have been created on a form.
